name: The End of the Road (quadcoder)
description:
The End of the Road

You are an adventurer who was exploring the end of a Road when you heard a noise and zombies started coming out of the ground Delay they inevitable. You have to kill as many of the zombies as you can.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move
click to shoot use the mouse to aim.

good luck!

Code, graphics and sound by quadcoder.

-- quadcoder

Please download the game if the browser version doesn't work.
